long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevent accidental messaging by locking Slack!


========================


Slack locker automatically locking message input. Click "Start editing" to type message.

If you want re-lock the message should reload page. (re-lock feature is in develop wait please üôè)
